full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DKOR BDAG RGYAL PO GTOR MA 'BUL TSUL BZHUGS SO,, ,,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES LJON LEGS RGYAL PO LA SOGS PA RNAL 'BYOR PA'I PHYI NANG DNGOS PO BSRUNG ZHING SKYONG BA'I DKOR BDAG RNAMS LA GTOR MA 'BUL TSUL DON KUN 'GRUB PA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DA LTA SNYIGS MA'I GANG ZAG LA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS SNYAM BSAM TE RANG GI SEMS LA GSOL SU GYUR TE BHU SU KU AARTHA SIDDHI MING CAN GYIS SUG BRIS SU SBYAR BA DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
